original_text: And he said to the people, “Go forward. March around the city and let the armed men pass on before the ark of the Lord.”
korean_text: 또 백성에게 이르되 나아가서 그 성을 돌되 무장한 자들이 여호와의 궤 앞에서 나아갈지니라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And he said to the people,
and let the armed men pass on
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 무장한 사람들이 앞서 지나가게 하라.

sentences.original_text: before the ark of the Lord.”
